params.command:
python3 - <<'PY'
import wave, struct, math
path='/private/tmp/audiocleaner_probe/test.wav'
fr=44100
secs=2.0
freq=440.0
amp=0.2
n=int(fr*secs)
with wave.open(path,'w') as w:
    w.setnchannels(1)
    w.setsampwidth(2)
    w.setframerate(fr)
    for i in range(n):
        v=amp*math.sin(2*math.pi*freq*(i/fr))
        w.writeframes(struct.pack('<h', int(max(-1,min(1,v))*32767)))
print(path)
PY
